Blue dragon
Verianthraxa was a blue dracolich that laired in Anauroch along with her mate Malygris for a time during the late 14 century DR.
In the , Namirrha of the Cult of the Dragon dispatched Verianthraxa and Malygris to assault the Citadel of the Raven in retaliation for Zhentarim raids on cult holdings in Sembia. Malygris Queen undead form was destroyed, as the Zhent forces were well-prepared for the draconic assault. In the years that followed, Malygris entered into a state of depression and took no interest in anything until meeting otherworldy beings that were resistant to his tremendous power.
